definition: pull up by or as if by the roots
details:
verb
- pull up by or as if by the roots
= example: pull up by or as if by the roots
= synonyms: extirpate
- destroy completely, as if down to the roots
= example: destroy completely, as if down to the roots
= synonyms: extirpate
- move (people) forcibly from their homeland into a new and foreign environment
= example: move (people) forcibly from their homeland into a new and foreign environment
= synonyms: deracinate
